attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We Are Asking The British Government,  To Agree To Provide Civilian Assistance Dog Benefits Paid By DWP & Military Assistance Dog Benefits Paid By MoD, To all Assistance Dog Charities / User’s To Help With The Costs Of These Animals.

rejection.details:
At present your title reads: Ex-Cllr Wendy M.Harbon[disabled]

Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
